title: Ethereum-Based Altcoin That’s Up Over 37% This Week Facing Massive FUD Just Days After Launch: Santiment
description:
Blockchain analytics platform Santiment says that one newly-launched red-hot Ethereum (ETH)-based crypto project is facing a bunch of criticism. Santiment says Worldcoin (WLD) has generated a lot of buzz on social media platforms shortly after its launch. Unfortunately, most of the conversation has been negative, with users calling it a “scam” and raising concerns about […]

The post Ethereum-Based Altcoin That’s Up Over 37% This Week Facing Massive FUD Just Days After Launch: Santiment appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
